title: A Randomized Open-Label, Placebo-Controlled  Study of DRM-581 (IL-17 inhibitor) in Patients With Spinal Muscular Atrophy
officialTitle: A Randomized Open-Label, Placebo-Controlled  Study of DRM-581 (IL-17 inhibitor) in Patients With Spinal Muscular Atrophy
description: This is a randomized open-label, placebo-controlled  study designed to evaluate the efficacy and safety of DRM-581 (IL-17 inhibitor) in patients with Spinal Muscular Atrophy. The study will enroll approximately 343 patients.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Adults aged 26-68 years
- Confirmed diagnosis of Spinal Muscular Atrophy
- ECOG performance status 0-1
- Adequate organ function
- Willing and able to provide informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:
- Known hypersensitivity to study drug or excipients
- Pregnant or breastfeeding women
- Participation in another interventional study within 30 days
- Significant cardiovascular disease within past 6 months
- Active or chronic infection requiring systemic treatment
